subject: Horse Racing
Fen-Phen (Drug Combination)
Suits and Litigation
Decisions and Verdicts
Frauds and Swindling
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Two of the owners of the Preakness champion Curlin were indicted by a federal grand jury for conspiring to defraud their clients in a $200 million lawsuit settlement.
snippet: Two of the owners of the Preakness champion Curlin were indicted by a federal grand jury for conspiring to defraud their clients in a $200 million lawsuit settlement.
